contract_items.content: Assess requirements complexity for one-to-many relationships

evidence.content: Requirements complexity assessed at 9/10 (Very High): Complex one-to-many appliance management, dynamic form field integration, sophisticated query/reporting requirements, high performance and security demands, and scalability concerns for millions of records.

contract_items.content: Evaluate architecture implications of schema restructuring

evidence.content: Architecture implications assessed at 8/10 (Very High): Major shift from embedded arrays to normalized relationships, Firebase constraint navigation, real-time synchronization complexity, client-side relationship resolution, and complex security rule management.

Technology constraints analyzed at 7/10 (High): Firebase Realtime Database limitations require client-side relationship resolution, complex security rules, performance optimization strategies, and careful indexing for query performance.

contract_items.content: Review development process factors for implementation

evidence.content: Development factors reviewed at 8/10 (Very High): Complex implementation requiring Firebase expertise, extensive testing, migration strategy, risk mitigation, and 7-10 week timeline for complete restructuring.
